channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Felix, a linguist

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2023 Zhang, Jun, & Wu, Yan. (2023). “Yixie” is likely not created equal for everyone: Distinct reasoning procedures in interpreting the same scalar quantifier. Lingua, 288, 103523. Link to fulltext 2022 Zhang, Jun, & Wu, Yan. (2022). Epistemic reasoning in pragmatic inferencing by non-native speakers: The case of scalar implicatures. Second Language Research, 02676583211069735. Link to fulltext 2020 Zhang, Jun, & Wu, Yan. (2020). Only youxie think it is a nice thing to say: Interpreting scalar items in face-threatening contexts by native Chinese speakers.
